venue.address_1: One Kendall Square, Building 200, Cambridge, MA
venue.name: Flat Top Johnny's

item.description:
Hello everyone,

I hope you all are doing well. Due to Simon's heavy traveling schedule, I am putting the next meetup together.

I thought we could hang out and relax at Flattop Johnny's around 7pm on Friday, April 6th. One funny interior designer who came to the last dinner meetup suggested it, and I think it's an excellent choice!

I believe there is a big parking garage attached to the nearby movie theater, and from there, Flat Top Johnny's is just across the street in the Kendall Square.

Details on directions and the menu are found at:
http://flattopjohnnys...

Hope to see you there ;-)
Soyoko

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Let's relax at Flattop Johhny's
